short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly run scripts against text selections

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Run scripts against text selections.

Adds a right-click menu item to send your selection to a scripting menu where you can run your saved scripts on the text.

Built in code editor uses Monaco (the base editor of VSCode).

Cover art by Jr Korpa (@jrkorpa on Unsplash)
